amendment.description: An amendment numbered 97 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit the use of funds to implement or enforce the SEC's Staff Legal Bulletin.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A063) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A063) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A063) Agreed to by voice vote.
